title: Wtb - PSA graded N172 Keefe and/or Ward
author: cozmokramer

posts.post_title: Wtb - PSA graded N172 Keefe and/or Ward
posts.post_content:
I'm looking for low grade (PSA 1-3) low cost examples of a Keefe and Ward HOF old judges.

Please PM with what you have available.

Cosmo--I have a nice Ward, that is guaranteed to get a number grade, a few posts down. Check it out--post of Better Old Judges"

Jay

Thanks Jay, it would be exactly what I'm looking for, right condition and price.

Unfortunately I don't submit cards to PSA myself, I only buy those already graded.
